“My 2 minutes”- training

Join the “My 2 Minutes” Workshop: Build Your Career Path in Poland at AGH University!
 under Welcome to Poland NAWA Programme

Are you an AGH international student, PhD candidate, or academic looking to establish a successful career in Poland? We’re thrilled to announce Centre for International Affairs is organising the 
first edition of the “My 2 Minutes” training,
 hosted by AGH University of Krakow! This dynamic, five-day event will take place in 
May 2025
, and it’s designed to help you build a strategic career path while navigating the unique opportunities Poland has to offer.

What is “My 2 Minutes”?

The training focuses on empowering participants to craft a concise and impactful pitch – your “2 minutes” – that highlights your skills, aspirations, and potential as a professional in Poland. It’s not just about career speeches; it’s about:

Career Development:
 Learn how to align your skills and experiences with the Polish job market.

Networking Skills:
 Master the art of meaningful professional connections.

Polish Workplace Culture:
 Gain insights into the Polish academic, research, and corporate ecosystems.

Personal Branding:
 Stand out with a strong, authentic personal brand.

How to sing up?

Complete this spreadsheet: 
https://forms.office.com/e/WKsUnDFtKG

and then submit the data processing documents that you will receive by e-mail.

Who Should Attend?

This workshop is tailored for:

International students currently enrolled in Polish universities.

PhD students eager to advance in academia or transition to industry roles.

Academics seeking opportunities to collaborate and grow in Poland’s dynamic education and research sectors.

What to Expect?

Over five days, participants will engage in:

Interactive Sessions:
 Led by experts in career coaching, HR, and Polish business culture.

Practical Exercises:
 Build and refine your 2-minute pitch, receive feedback, and practice in real-life scenarios.

Networking Events:
 Meet potential mentors, collaborators, and employers.

Cultural Workshops:
 Understand Poland’s work culture to confidently take the next step in your career.

Save the Date!

The first edition of the “My 2 Minutes” workshop will run in 
May 2025
. Detailed agenda will be announced soon, so stay tuned!
